title: Procter & Gamble
summary: The Procter & Gamble Company (P&G) is an American multinational consumer goods corporation headquartered in Cincinnati, Ohio, founded in 1837 by William Procter and James Gamble.[2] It specializes in a wide range of personal health/consumer health, and personal care and hygiene products; these products are organized into several segments including  Beauty; Grooming; Health Care; Fabric & Home Care; and Baby, Feminine, & Family Care. Before the sale of Pringles to Kellogg's, its product portfolio also included food, snacks, and beverages.[3] P&G is incorporated in Ohio.[4]
